name: NASDAQ100 Mean-Reversion Donchian Volume Spike
description: Mean-reversion strategy for NASDAQ-100 large-cap stocks. Long entry when price closes below 20-day Donchian lower band with a ≥1.8× 20-day average volume spike. Exit when price closes above 10-day SMA, a 10 % trailing stop hits, or a 2:1 R:R profit target is reached. Per-trade risk limited to 0.8 % of equity.
